headline: Is Intercontinental Exchange Worth a Fresh Look After $2B Polymarket Investment Talks?
summary: If you are eyeing Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) right now, you are likely wondering whether the recent price swings signal a real opportunity or just more market noise. After a rocky patch, with shares down nearly 11% over the last month and off 6.9% since this time last year, some investors are questioning if now is the moment to buy, hold, or just wait and see. Yet, it is hard to ignore the company’s powerful multi-year returns, with the stock up over 70% in three years and 65.5% across...
